# UIInterpolatingMotionEffect.EffectType.tiltAlongVerticalAxis

**Case**

Interpolate values along the vertical axis, which involves the device facing above or below the user’s viewpoint.

## Declaration

```swift
case tiltAlongVerticalAxis
```

## Constants

- **UIInterpolatingMotionEffect.EffectType.tiltAlongHorizontalAxis**: Interpolate values along the horizontal axis, which involves the device facing left or right of the user’s viewpoint.

items.description: Interpolate values along the horizontal axis, which involves the device facing left or right of the user’s viewpoint.
items.name: UIInterpolatingMotionEffect.EffectType.tiltAlongHorizontalAxis
